description:

i have de-activated the long intro-movie, its NOT RIPPED away
its just not activated, you can activate it , if you know how...
if you dont know, then simply stay away!.




<->( about )<-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><->

Dark Messiah of Might & Magic puts players in a first-person        
perspective, allowing them to immerse themselves in the legendary   
Might and Magic universe as never before. It is also the world&#039;s    
first fantasy action game to feature a complete                     
first-person combat system.                                         
                           
                                                                          
        
               
<->( more )<-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><->

not sure if your system can handle the game ? go here... <a href="
http://www.systemrequirementslab.com/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.systemrequirementslab.com/</a>
choose game from dropdown menu and run test. 



<->( how to play )<-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><->

1.: Unrar with WinRar ( newest! ) ... or use 7zip.

2.: double click: DarkMess.exe  ( must be done! )

3.: run game with desktop icon!.

( size after all about 7.1+ gigs... )



<->( general hints )<-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><->

read everything carefuly, especially the following below ...


 
<->( Special Info )<-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><->

Some virus-scanner recognize the header of a packed .exe file , in this

case its the file > DarkMess.exe < as a lame virus, because its  the 

byte by byte check error of some virustools!. ( h e u r i s t i c s  ) but... 

Its almost certainly a false positive alert from overly protective heuristics,

you can read more about in your VirusTool-Manual or VirusTools-WebSite!.

(heuristics). you can also upload the file to certain websites to let them test.

with this result...> a false positive alert from... >>>  thank you for reading!.
